summary: Tells the story of Jesus Christ at age seven as he and his family depart Egypt to return home to Nazareth. Told from his childhood perspective, it follows young Jesus as he grows into his religious identity.
cast: Adam Greaves-Neal|Sara Lazzaro|Vincent Walsh|Finn Ireland|Christian McKay|Agni Scott|Lois Ellington|Jane Lapotaire|Duné Medros|Rory Keenan|Sean Bean|Clive Russell|Jonathan Bailey|David Bradley|David Burke|Jacopo Alaimo|Dorotea Mercuri|Jarreth J. Merz|Gabriele Dentoni|Douglas Dean|Christopher Jones|Matt Patresi|Matteo Carlomagno|Giselda Volodi|Lydia Muijen|Ioan Gunn|Niccolò Senni|Giampiero Rotoli|Giorgio Antonini|Lee Boardman|Giulio Cristini|Paul Ireland|Michele Bevilacqua|Harold Bradley|Francesco De Vito|Simone Spinazze|Silvia De Santis|Andrea Scarduzio|Francesco Carnelutti|Isabelle Adriani|Ben Oduwole|Terence Nadesan|Marco Iannone|Niccolò Alaimo|Gabrielle Chiararo|Paola Lavini|Pierluigi Pasino|Christopher Jones|Gianluca Valente
title: El joven mesías
